  <title>
   Quicksort
  </title>
  <meta content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv="content-type"/>
  <meta content="sorting, divide and conquer" name="keywords"/>
  <meta content="Description of the Quicksort algorithm (course material)" name="description"/>
  <meta content="Hans Werner Lang; Flensburg University of Applied Sciences, Germany" name="author"/>

   "   &gt;      
   m   e   t   a       h   t   t   p   -   e   q   u   i   v   =   "   c   o   n   t   e   n   t   -   l   a   n   g   u   a   g   e   "       c   o   n   t   e   n   t   =   "   e   n   "   &gt;      
   m   e   t   a       n   a   m   e   =   "   g   e   o   .   r   e   g   i   o   n   "       c   o   n   t   e   n   t   =   "   D   E   -   S   H   "   &gt;      
   m   e   t   a       n   a   m   e   =   "   g   e   o   .   p   l   a   c   e   n   a   m   e   "       c   o   n   t   e   n   t   =   "   F   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g   "   &gt;      
   m   e   t   a       n   a   m   e   =   "   g   e   o   .   p   o   s   i   t   i   o   n   "       c   o   n   t   e   n   t   =   "   5   4   .   7   7   4   4   5   5   ;   9   .   4   4   8   9   7   2   "   &gt;      
   l   i   n   k       r   e   l   =   "   s   t   y   l   e   s   h   e   e   t   "       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   c   s   s   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   a   r   i   a   l   .   c   s   s   "   &gt;      
   l   i   n   k       r   e   l   =   "   s   t   y   l   e   s   h   e   e   t   "       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   c   s   s   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   s   o   r   t   .   c   s   s   "   &gt;      
      
   l   i   n   k       r   e   l   =   "   s   h   o   r   t   c   u   t       i   c   o   n   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   f   a   v   i   c   o   n   .   i   c   o   "   &gt;      
   l   i   n   k       r   e   l   =   "   u   p   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   u   p   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   a   l   g   o   e   n   .   h   t   m   "   &gt;      
   l   i   n   k       r   e   l   =   "   s   t   a   r   t   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   h   o   m   e       p   a   g   e   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   i   n   d   e   x   e   n   .   h   t   m   "   &gt;      
   l   i   n   k       r   e   l   =   "   n   e   x   t   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   n   e   x   t       p   a   g   e   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   h   e   a   p   /   h   e   a   p   e   n   .   h   t   m   "   &gt;      
   l   i   n   k       r   e   l   =   "   a   u   t   h   o   r   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   a   u   t   h   o   r   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   i   n   d   e   x   e   n   .   h   t   m   "   &gt;      
      
   s   c   r   i   p   t       t   y   p   e   =   "   t   e   x   t   /   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   "       s   r   c   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   g   l   o   s   s   a   r   /   h   e   l   p   .   j   s   "   &gt;   /   s   c   r   i   p   t   &gt;      
   /   h   e   a   d   &gt;      
      
   b   o   d   y   &gt;   a       n   a   m   e   =   "   s   e   c   t   i   o   n   0   "       h   r   e   f   =   "   #   s   e   c   t   i   o   n   0   "       a   c   c   e   s   s   k   e   y   =   "   1   "   &gt;   /   a   &gt;      
   d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   b   o   d   y   "   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   0   %   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d   &gt;   h   1   &gt;   S   o   r   t   i   n   g       a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   s   /   h   1   &gt;      
   h   2   &gt;   Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   /   h   2   &gt;      
   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   "   t   o   p   "       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   r   i   g   h   t   "   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   q   u   i   c   k   .   h   t   m   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   t   o   p   "   &gt;   i   m   g       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   s   c   r   e   e   n   "       s   r   c   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   s   y   m   b   o   l   s   /   d   e   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   9   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   9   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       a   l   t   =   "   G   e   r   m   a   n       v   e   r   s   i   o   n   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   G   e   r   m   a   n       v   e   r   s   i   o   n   "   &gt;   /   a   &gt;      
   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   a   l   g   o   e   n   .   h   t   m   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   t   o   p   "       a   c   c   e   s   s   k   e   y   =   "   6   "   &gt;   i   m   g       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   s   c   r   e   e   n   "       s   r   c   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   s   y   m   b   o   l   s   /   u   p   .   g   i   f   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   9   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   9   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       a   l   t   =   "   u   p   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   u   p   "   &gt;   /   a   &gt;      
   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
      
   p   &gt;   Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t       i   s       o   n   e       o   f       t   h   e       f   a   s   t   e   s   t       a   n   d       s   i   m   p   l   e   s   t       s   o   r   t   i   n   g       a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   s       a       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   C   .   A   .   R   .       H   o   a   r   e   :       Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   .       C   o   m   p   u   t   e   r       J   o   u   r   n   a   l   ,       V   o   l   .       5   ,       1   ,       1   0   -   1   5       (   1   9   6   2   )   "   &gt;   [   H   o   a   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   6   2   ]   /   a   &gt;   .       I   t       w   o   r   k   s       r   e   c   u   r   s   i   v   e   l   y       b   y       a       d   i   v   i   d   e   -   a   n   d   -   c   o   n   q   u   e   r       s   t   r   a   t   e   g   y   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   j   a   v   a   s   c   r   i   p   t   :   w   i   n   d   (   '   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   g   l   o   s   s   a   r   /   d   i   v   c   o   n   q   e   .   h   t   m   '   ,   7   0   0   ,   3   0   0   ,   '   n   o   '   )   ;   "   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   g   l   o   s   s   a   r   /   i   .   g   i   f   "       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   b   o   t   t   o   m   "       a   l   t   =   "   e   x   p   l   a   n   a   t   i   o   n   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   .       /   p   &gt;      
      
   p       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   b   s   t   "   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   p   &gt;      
      
   h   3       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   h   e   a   d   e   r   "   &gt;   a       n   a   m   e   =   "   s   e   c   t   i   o   n   1   "   &gt;   I   d   e   a   /   a   &gt;   /   h   3   &gt;      
      
   p   &gt;   F   i   r   s   t   ,       t   h   e       s   e   q   u   e   n   c   e       t   o       b   e       s   o   r   t   e   d       v   a   r   &gt;   a   /   v   a   r   &gt;       i   s       p   a   r   t   i   t   i   o   n   e   d       i   n   t   o       t   w   o       p   a   r   t   s   ,       s   u   c   h       t   h   a   t       a   l   l       e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s       o   f       t   h   e       f   i   r   s   t       p   a   r   t       v   a   r   &gt;   b   /   v   a   r   &gt;       a   r   e       l   e   s   s       t   h   a   n       o   r       e   q   u   a   l       t   o       a   l   l       e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s       o   f       t   h   e       s   e   c   o   n   d       p   a   r   t       v   a   r   &gt;   c   /   v   a   r   &gt;       (   d   i   v   i   d   e   )   .       T   h   e   n       t   h   e       t   w   o       p   a   r   t   s       a   r   e       s   o   r   t   e   d       s   e   p   a   r   a   t   e   l   y       b   y       r   e   c   u   r   s   i   v   e       a   p   p   l   i   c   a   t   i   o   n       o   f       t   h   e       s   a   m   e       p   r   o   c   e   d   u   r   e       (   c   o   n   q   u   e   r   )   .       R   e   c   o   m   b   i   n   a   t   i   o   n       o   f       t   h   e       t   w   o       p   a   r   t   s       y   i   e   l   d   s       t   h   e       s   o   r   t   e   d       s   e   q   u   e   n   c   e       (   c   o   m   b   i   n   e   )   .       F   i   g   u   r   e       1       i   l   l   u   s   t   r   a   t   e   s       t   h   i   s       a   p   p   r   o   a   c   h   .       /   p   &gt;      
      
   d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   i   n   d   "   &gt;      
               t   a   b   l   e       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "   &gt;      
               t   r   &gt;   t   d       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   0   "   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
               t   r   &gt;   t   d       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   c   e   n   t   e   r   "   &gt;      
                           t   a   b   l   e       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "   &gt;   t   r   &gt;      
                           t   d       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   "   b   o   t   t   o   m   "       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   c   e   n   t   e   r   "   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   q   u   i   c   k   s   r   t   .   g   i   f   "       a   l   t   =   "   D   i   v   i   d   e       a   n   d       C   o   n   q   u   e   r   :       Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   (   n   )   "   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;      
                           /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
               /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
               t   r   &gt;   t   d       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   c   e   n   t   e   r   "   &gt;      
               /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
      
               t   r   &gt;   t   d       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   0   "   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
      
               t   r   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   b   e   z   "   &gt;   F   i   g   u   r   e       1   :   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   (   n   )   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   0   "   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
               /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   /   d   i   v   &gt;      
      
   p   &gt;   T   h   e       f   i   r   s   t       s   t   e   p       o   f       t   h   e       p   a   r   t   i   t   i   o   n       p   r   o   c   e   d   u   r   e       i   s       c   h   o   o   s   i   n   g       a       c   o   m   p   a   r   i   s   o   n       e   l   e   m   e   n   t       v   a   r   &gt;   x   /   v   a   r   &gt;   .       A   l   l       e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s       o   f       t   h   e       s   e   q   u   e   n   c   e       t   h   a   t       a   r   e       l   e   s   s       t   h   a   n       v   a   r   &gt;   x   /   v   a   r   &gt;       a   r   e       p   l   a   c   e   d       i   n       t   h   e       f   i   r   s   t       p   a   r   t   ,       a   l   l       e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s       g   r   e   a   t   e   r       t   h   a   n       v   a   r   &gt;   x   /   v   a   r   &gt;       a   r   e       p   l   a   c   e   d       i   n       t   h   e       s   e   c   o   n   d       p   a   r   t   .       F   o   r       e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s       e   q   u   a   l       t   o       v   a   r   &gt;   x   /   v   a   r   &gt;       i   t       d   o   e   s       n   o   t       m   a   t   t   e   r       i   n   t   o       w   h   i   c   h       p   a   r   t       t   h   e   y       c   o   m   e   .       I   n       t   h   e       f   o   l   l   o   w   i   n   g       a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m       i   t       m   a   y       a   l   s   o       h   a   p   p   e   n       t   h   a   t       a   n       e   l   e   m   e   n   t       e   q   u   a   l       t   o       v   a   r   &gt;   x   /   v   a   r   &gt;       r   e   m   a   i   n   s       b   e   t   w   e   e   n       t   h   e       t   w   o       p   a   r   t   s   .       /   p   &gt;      
      
      
   p       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   b   s   t   "   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   p   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   "   5   "       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   "   0   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   0   %   "   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   0   "   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       c   o   l   s   p   a   n   =   2   &gt;   b   &gt;   A   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m       v   a   r   &gt;   P   a   r   t   i   t   i   o   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;   /   b   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   "   t   o   p   "   &gt;   b   &gt;   I   n   p   u   t   :   /   b   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d   &gt;   s   e   q   u   e   n   c   e       v   a   r   &gt;   a   /   v   a   r   &gt;   s   u   b   &gt;   0   /   s   u   b   &gt;   ,   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   .   .   .   ,   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   v   a   r   &gt;   a   /   v   a   r   &gt;   s   u   b   &gt;   v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;   -   1   /   s   u   b   &gt;       w   i   t   h       v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;       e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s       /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   "   t   o   p   "   &gt;   b   &gt;   O   u   t   p   u   t   :   /   b   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d   &gt;   p   e   r   m   u   t   a   t   i   o   n       o   f       t   h   e       s   e   q   u   e   n   c   e       s   u   c   h       t   h   a   t       a   l   l       e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s       v   a   r   &gt;   a   /   v   a   r   &gt;   s   u   b   &gt;   0   /   s   u   b   &gt;   ,   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   .   .   .   ,   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   v   a   r   &gt;   a   /   v   a   r   &gt;   s   u   b   &gt;   v   a   r   &gt;   j   /   v   a   r   &gt;   /   s   u   b   &gt;       a   r   e       l   e   s   s       t   h   a   n       o   r       e   q   u   a   l       t   o       a   l   l       e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s       v   a   r   &gt;   a   /   v   a   r   &gt;   s   u   b   &gt;   v   a   r   &gt;   i   /   v   a   r   &gt;   /   s   u   b   &gt;   ,   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   .   .   .   ,   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   v   a   r   &gt;   a   /   v   a   r   &gt;   s   u   b   &gt;   v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;   -   1   /   s   u   b   &gt;       &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       (   v   a   r   &gt;   i   /   v   a   r   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   &amp;g   t   ;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   v   a   r   &gt;   j   /   v   a   r   &gt;   )       /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   "   t   o   p   "   &gt;   b   &gt;   M   e   t   h   o   d   :   /   b   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   -   l   e   f   t   :       0   p   x   ;       p   a   d   d   i   n   g   -   t   o   p   :       0   p   x   "   &gt;      
   o   l       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   n   o   n   "       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   l   i   s   t   -   s   t   y   l   e   -   t   y   p   e   :       n   o   n   e   "   &gt;   l   i   &gt;      
   c   h   o   o   s   e       t   h   e       e   l   e   m   e   n   t       i   n       t   h   e       m   i   d   d   l   e       o   f       t   h   e       s   e   q   u   e   n   c   e       a   s       c   o   m   p   a   r   i   s   o   n       e   l   e   m   e   n   t       v   a   r   &gt;   x   /   v   a   r   &gt;          
   p   &gt;      
   l   e   t       v   a   r   &gt;   i   /   v   a   r   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   =   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   0       a   n   d       v   a   r   &gt;   j   /   v   a   r   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   =   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;   -   1          
   /   p   &gt;      
   p   &gt;      
   w   h   i   l   e       v   a   r   &gt;   i   /   v   a   r   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   s   y   m   b   o   l   s   /   l   e   .   g   i   f   "       a   l   t   =   "   =   "   &gt;   v   a   r   &gt;   j   /   v   a   r   &gt;          
   /   p   &gt;      
      
   o   l       s   t   y   l   e   =   "   l   i   s   t   -   s   t   y   l   e   -   t   y   p   e   :       n   o   n   e   "   &gt;   l   i   &gt;      
   s   e   a   r   c   h       f   o   r       t   h   e       f   i   r   s   t       e   l   e   m   e   n   t       v   a   r   &gt;   a   /   v   a   r   &gt;   s   u   b   &gt;   v   a   r   &gt;   i   /   v   a   r   &gt;   /   s   u   b   &gt;       w   h   i   c   h       i   s       g   r   e   a   t   e   r       t   h   a   n       o   r       e   q   u   a   l       t   o       v   a   r   &gt;   x   /   v   a   r   &gt;

   h   3       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   h   e   a   d   e   r   "   &gt;   a       n   a   m   e   =   "   s   e   c   t   i   o   n   4   "   &gt;   A   n   a   l   y   s   i   s   /   a   &gt;   /   h   3   &gt;      
      
   p   &gt;   T   h   e       b   e   s   t   -   c   a   s   e       b   e   h   a   v   i   o   r       o   f       t   h   e       q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t       a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m       o   c   c   u   r   s       w   h   e   n       i   n       e   a   c   h       r   e   c   u   r   s   i   o   n       s   t   e   p       t   h   e       p   a   r   t   i   t   i   o   n   i   n   g       p   r   o   d   u   c   e   s       t   w   o       p   a   r   t   s       o   f       e   q   u   a   l       l   e   n   g   t   h   .       I   n       o   r   d   e   r       t   o       s   o   r   t       v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;       e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s   ,       i   n       t   h   i   s       c   a   s   e       t   h   e       r   u   n   n   i   n   g       t   i   m   e       i   s       i   n       &amp;T   h   e   t   a   ;   (   v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;       l   o   g   (   v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;   )   )   .       T   h   i   s       i   s       b   e   c   a   u   s   e       t   h   e       r   e   c   u   r   s   i   o   n       d   e   p   t   h       i   s       l   o   g   (   v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;   )       a   n   d       o   n       e   a   c   h       l   e   v   e   l       t   h   e   r   e       a   r   e       v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;       e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s       t   o       b   e       t   r   e   a   t   e   d       (   F   i   g   u   r   e       2       a   )   .       /   p   &gt;      
      
   p   &gt;   T   h   e       w   o   r   s   t       c   a   s   e       o   c   c   u   r   s       w   h   e   n       i   n       e   a   c   h       r   e   c   u   r   s   i   o   n       s   t   e   p       a   n       u   n   b   a   l   a   n   c   e   d       p   a   r   t   i   t   i   o   n   i   n   g       i   s       p   r   o   d   u   c   e   d   ,       n   a   m   e   l   y       t   h   a   t       o   n   e       p   a   r   t       c   o   n   s   i   s   t   s       o   f       o   n   l   y       o   n   e       e   l   e   m   e   n   t       a   n   d       t   h   e       o   t   h   e   r       p   a   r   t       c   o   n   s   i   s   t   s       o   f       t   h   e       r   e   s   t       o   f       t   h   e       e   l   e   m   e   n   t   s       (   F   i   g   u   r   e       2       c   )   .       T   h   e   n       t   h   e       r   e   c   u   r   s   i   o   n       d   e   p   t   h       i   s       v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;   -   1       a   n   d       q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t       r   u   n   s       i   n       t   i   m   e       &amp;T   h   e   t   a   ;   (   v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;   s   u   p   &gt;   2   /   s   u   p   &gt;   )   .       /   p   &gt;      
      
   p   &gt;   I   n       t   h   e       a   v   e   r   a   g   e       c   a   s   e       a       p   a   r   t   i   t   i   o   n   i   n   g       a   s       s   h   o   w   n       i   n       F   i   g   u   r   e       2       b       i   s       t   o       b   e       e   x   p   e   c   t   e   d   .       /   p   &gt;      
      
   d   i   v       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   i   n   d   "   &gt;      
               t   a   b   l   e       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "   &gt;

               t   r   &gt;   t   d       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   c   e   n   t   e   r   "   &gt;      
                           t   a   b   l   e       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "   &gt;   t   r   &gt;      
                           t   d       v   a   l   i   g   n   =   "   b   o   t   t   o   m   "       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   c   e   n   t   e   r   "   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   q   u   i   c   k   c   p   x   .   g   i   f   "       a   l   t   =   "   R   e   c   u   r   s   i   o   n       d   e   p   t   h       o   f       q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   :       a   )       b   e   s   t       c   a   s   e   ,       b   )       a   v   e   r   a   g   e       c   a   s   e   ,       c   )       w   o   r   s   t       c   a   s   e   "   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;

               t   r   &gt;   t   d       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   0   "   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
      
               t   r   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   b   e   z   "   &gt;   F   i   g   u   r   e       2   :   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       R   e   c   u   r   s   i   o   n       d   e   p   t   h       o   f       q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   :       a   )       b   e   s   t       c   a   s   e   ,       b   )       a   v   e   r   a   g   e       c   a   s   e   ,       c   )       w   o   r   s   t       c   a   s   e   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;

   p   &gt;   T   h   e       c   h   o   i   c   e       o   f       t   h   e       c   o   m   p   a   r   i   s   o   n       e   l   e   m   e   n   t       v   a   r   &gt;   x   /   v   a   r   &gt;       d   e   t   e   r   m   i   n   e   s       w   h   i   c   h       p   a   r   t   i   t   i   o   n       i   s       a   c   h   i   e   v   e   d   .    p   &gt;   E   v   e   n       b   e   t   t   e   r       w   o   u   l   d       i   t       b   e       t   o       t   a   k   e       t   h   e       v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;   /   2   -   t   h       g   r   e   a   t   e   s   t       e   l   e   m   e   n   t       o   f       t   h   e       s   e   q   u   e   n   c   e       (   t   h   e       m   e   d   i   a   n   )   .    p   &gt;   Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t       t   u   r   n   s       o   u   t       t   o       b   e       t   h   e       f   a   s   t   e   s   t       s   o   r   t   i   n   g       a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m       i   n       p   r   a   c   t   i   c   e   . H   o   w   e   v   e   r   ,       i   n       t   h   e       (   v   e   r   y       r   a   r   e   )       w   o   r   s   t       c   a   s   e       q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t       i   s       a   s       s   l   o   w       a   s       a       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   n   e   t   w   o   r   k   s   /   s   o   r   t   i   e   r   e   n   .   h   t   m   #   s   e   c   t   i   o   n   3   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   t   o   p   "   &gt;   B   u   b   b   l   e   s   o   r   t   /   a   &gt;   ,       n   a   m   e   l   y       i   n       &amp;T   h   e   t   a   ;   (   v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;   s   u   p   &gt;   2   /   s   u   p   &gt;   )   .       T   h   e   r   e       a   r   e       s   o   r   t   i   n   g       a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   s       w   i   t   h       a       t   i   m   e       c   o   m   p   l   e   x   i   t   y       o   f       v   a   r   &gt;   O   /   v   a   r   &gt;   (   v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;       l   o   g   (   v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;   )   )       e   v   e   n       i   n       t   h   e       w   o   r   s   t       c   a   s   e   ,       e   .   g   .       a       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   h   e   a   p   /   h   e   a   p   e   n   .   h   t   m   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   t   o   p   "   &gt;   H   e   a   p   s   o   r   t   /   a   &gt;       a   n   d       a       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   m   e   r   g   e   /   m   e   r   g   e   n   .   h   t   m   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   t   o   p   "   &gt;   M   e   r   g   e   s   o   r   t   /   a   &gt;   .       B   u   t       o   n       t   h   e       a   v   e   r   a   g   e   ,       t   h   e   s   e       a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   s       a   r   e       b   y       a       c   o   n   s   t   a   n   t       f   a   c   t   o   r       s   l   o   w   e   r       t   h   a   n       q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   .       /   p   &gt;      
      
   p   &gt;   I   t       i   s       p   o   s   s   i   b   l   e       t   o       o   b   t   a   i   n       a       w   o   r   s   t       c   a   s   e       c   o   m   p   l   e   x   i   t   y       o   f       v   a   r   &gt;   O   /   v   a   r   &gt;   (   v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;       l   o   g   (   v   a   r   &gt;   n   /   v   a   r   &gt;   )   )       w   i   t   h       a       v   a   r   i   a   n   t       o   f       q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t       (   b   y       c   h   o   o   s   i   n   g       t   h   e       m   e   d   i   a   n       a   s       c   o   m   p   a   r   i   s   o   n       e   l   e   m   e   n   t   )   .    p       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   b   s   t   "   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   p   &gt;      
      
   h   3       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   h   e   a   d   e   r   "   &gt;   a       n   a   m   e   =   "   s   e   c   t   i   o   n   7   "   &gt;   R   e   f   e   r   e   n   c   e   s   /   a   &gt;   /   h   3   &gt;      
      
   p   &gt;   Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t       w   a   s       o   r   i   g   i   n   a   l   l   y       p   u   b   l   i   s   h   e   d       b   y       C   .   A   .   R   .    t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   0   %   "       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   "   0   "       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   "   0   "   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   l   i   t   r   e   f   "   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   5   "   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   l   i   t   r   e   f   "   &gt;   [   A   H   U   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   7   4   ]   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   l   i   t   "       c   o   l   s   p   a   n   =   "   2   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   p   e   r   s   o   n   "   &gt;   A   . U   l   l   m   a   n   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   :       T   h   e       D   e   s   i   g   n       a   n   d       A   n   a   l   y   s   i   s       o   f       C   o   m   p   u   t   e   r       A   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   s   .       A   d   d   i   s   o   n   -   W   e   s   l   e   y       (   1   9   7   4   )   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   l   i   t   r   e   f   "   &gt;   [   H   o   a   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   6   2   ]   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   l   i   t   "       c   o   l   s   p   a   n   =   "   2   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   p   e   r   s   o   n   "   &gt;   C   .   A   .   R   .       H   o   a   r   e   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   :       Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   .       C   o   m   p   u   t   e   r       J   o   u   r   n   a   l   ,       V   o   l   .       5   ,       1   ,       1   0   -   1   5       (   1   9   6   2   )   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   l   i   t   r   e   f   "   &gt;   [   C   L   R   S   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   0   1   ]   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   l   i   t   "       c   o   l   s   p   a   n   =   "   2   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   p   e   r   s   o   n   "   &gt;   T   .   H   .       C   o   r   m   e   n   ,       C   .   E   .       L   e   i   s   e   r   s   o   n   ,       R   .   L   .       R   i   v   e   s   t   ,       C   .       S   t   e   i   n   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   :       I   n   t   r   o   d   u   c   t   i   o   n       t   o       A   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   s   .       2   n   d       e   d   i   t   i   o   n   ,       T   h   e       M   I   T       P   r   e   s   s       (   2   0   0   1   )   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   l   i   t   r   e   f   "   &gt;   [   S   e   d   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   0   3   ]   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   l   i   t   "       c   o   l   s   p   a   n   =   "   2   "   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   p   e   r   s   o   n   "   &gt;   R   .       S   e   d   g   e   w   i   c   k   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   :       A   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   s       i   n       J   a   v   a   ,       P   a   r   t   s       1   -   4   .       3   r   d       e   d   i   t   i   o   n   ,       A   d   d   i   s   o   n   -   W   e   s   l   e   y       (   2   0   0   3   )   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
      
   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
      
   p       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   b   s   t   "   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   p   &gt;      
   h   5   &gt;   s   p   a   n       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   s   b   h   "   &gt;   W   e   b   /   s   p   a   n   &gt;   /   h   5   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   0   %   "       c   e   l   l   p   a   d   d   i   n   g   =   "   0   "       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   "   0   "   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   l   i   t   r   e   f   "   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   5   "   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   t   r   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   l   i   t   r   e   f   "   &gt;   [   W   e   b       1   ]   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   l   i   t   "       c   o   l   s   p   a   n   =   "   2   "   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   b   l   u   f   f   t   o   n   .   e   d   u   /   ~   n   e   s   t   e   r   d   /   j   a   v   a   /   S   o   r   t   i   n   g   D   e   m   o   .   h   t   m   l   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   t   o   p   "   &gt;   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   b   l   u   f   f   t   o   n   .   e   d   u   /   ~   n   e   s   t   e   r   d   /   j   a   v   a   /   S   o   r   t   i   n   g   D   e   m   o   .   h   t   m   l   /   a   &gt;       &amp;n   b   s   p   ;           S   i   m   u   l   a   t   i   o   n       o   f       q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t       a   n   d       o   t   h   e   r       s   o   r   t   i   n   g       a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   s       /   t   d   &gt;   t   d   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;      
   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
      
   p       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   b   s   t   "   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   p   &gt;

   p       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   b   s   t   "   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   p   &gt;      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   0   %   "       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   t   r   a   i   l   e   r   "   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d   &gt;       N   e   x   t   :       &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       a       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   h   e   a   p   /   h   e   a   p   e   n   .   h   t   m   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   t   o   p   "   &gt;   [   H   e   a   p   s   o   r   t   ]   /   a   &gt;       &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       o   r       &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       a       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   a   l   g   o   e   n   .   h   t   m   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   t   o   p   "   &gt;   i   m   g       s   r   c   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   s   y   m   b   o   l   s   /   u   p   1   .   g   i   f   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       a   l   t   =   "   u   p   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   u   p   "       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   b   o   t   t   o   m   "   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   t   d       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   r   i   g   h   t   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   8   5   "   &gt;      
   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   d   e   l   .   i   c   i   o   .   u   s   /   p   o   s   t   /   p   o   s   t   ?   u   r   l   =   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   i   n   f   .   f   h   -   f   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g   .   d   e   /   l   a   n   g   /   a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   e   n   /   s   o   r   t   i   e   r   e   n   /   q   u   i   c   k   /   q   u   i   c   k   e   n   .   h   t   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   i   t   l   e   =   Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   d   e   l   .   i   c   i   o   .   u   s   "   &gt;      
   i   m   g       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   s   c   r   e   e   n   "       s   r   c   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   b   o   o   k   m   a   r   k   l   e   t   s   /   d   e   l   i   c   i   o   u   s   .   p   n   g   "       a   l   t   =   "   d   e   l   .   i   c   i   o   .   u   s   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "   &gt;   /   a   &gt;          
   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   d   i   g   g   .   c   o   m   /   s   u   b   m   i   t   ?   p   h   a   s   e   =   2   &amp;a   m   p   ;   u   r   l   =   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   i   n   f   .   f   h   -   f   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g   .   d   e   /   l   a   n   g   /   a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   e   n   /   s   o   r   t   i   e   r   e   n   /   q   u   i   c   k   /   q   u   i   c   k   e   n   .   h   t   m   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   d   i   g   g   .   c   o   m   "   &gt;

   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   g   o   o   g   l   e   .   c   o   m   /   b   o   o   k   m   a   r   k   s   /   m   a   r   k   ?   u   =   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   i   n   f   .   f   h   -   f   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g   .   d   e   /   l   a   n   g   /   a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   e   n   /   s   o   r   t   i   e   r   e   n   /   q   u   i   c   k   /   q   u   i   c   k   e   n   .   h   t   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   o   p   =   a   d   d   &amp;a   m   p   ;   b   k   m   k   =   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   i   n   f   .   f   h   -   f   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g   .   d   e   /   l   a   n   g   /   a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   e   n   /   s   o   r   t   i   e   r   e   n   /   q   u   i   c   k   /   q   u   i   c   k   e   n   .   h   t   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   i   t   l   e   =   Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   G   o   o   g   l   e   "   &gt;

   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   m   i   s   t   e   r   -   w   o   n   g   .   d   e   /   i   n   d   e   x   .   p   h   p   ?   a   c   t   i   o   n   =   a   d   d   u   r   l   &amp;a   m   p   ;   b   m   _   u   r   l   =   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   i   n   f   .   f   h   -   f   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g   .   d   e   /   l   a   n   g   /   a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   e   n   /   s   o   r   t   i   e   r   e   n   /   q   u   i   c   k   /   q   u   i   c   k   e   n   .   h   t   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   b   m   _   d   e   s   c   r   i   p   t   i   o   n   =   Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   M   i   s   t   e   r       W   o   n   g   "   &gt;

   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   s   t   u   m   b   l   e   u   p   o   n   .   c   o   m   /   s   u   b   m   i   t   ?   u   r   l   =   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   i   n   f   .   f   h   -   f   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g   .   d   e   /   l   a   n   g   /   a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   e   n   /   s   o   r   t   i   e   r   e   n   /   q   u   i   c   k   /   q   u   i   c   k   e   n   .   h   t   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   i   t   l   e   =   Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   S   t   u   m   b   l   e   U   p   o   n   "   &gt;      
   i   m   g       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   s   c   r   e   e   n   "       s   r   c   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   b   o   o   k   m   a   r   k   l   e   t   s   /   s   u   .   p   n   g   "       a   l   t   =   "   S   t   u   m   b   l   e   U   p   o   n   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "   &gt;   /   a   &gt;          
   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   m   y   w   e   b   .   y   a   h   o   o   .   c   o   m   /   m   y   r   e   s   u   l   t   s   /   b   o   o   k   m   a   r   k   l   e   t   ?   u   =   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   i   n   f   .   f   h   -   f   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g   .   d   e   /   l   a   n   g   /   a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   e   n   /   s   o   r   t   i   e   r   e   n   /   q   u   i   c   k   /   q   u   i   c   k   e   n   .   h   t   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   =   Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   Y   a   h   o   o   M   y   W   e   b   "   &gt;      
   i   m   g       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   s   c   r   e   e   n   "       s   r   c   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   b   o   o   k   m   a   r   k   l   e   t   s   /   y   a   h   o   o   m   y   w   e   b   .   g   i   f   "       a   l   t   =   "   Y   a   h   o   o   M   y   W   e   b   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "   &gt;   /   a   &gt;          
   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   l   i   n   k   a   r   e   n   a   .   c   o   m   /   b   o   o   k   m   a   r   k   s   /   a   d   d   l   i   n   k   /   ?   u   r   l   =   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   i   n   f   .   f   h   -   f   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g   .   d   e   /   l   a   n   g   /   a   l   g   o   r   i   t   h   m   e   n   /   s   o   r   t   i   e   r   e   n   /   q   u   i   c   k   /   q   u   i   c   k   e   n   .   h   t   m   &amp;a   m   p   ;   t   i   t   l   e   =   Q   u   i   c   k   s   o   r   t   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   L   i   n   k   A   R   E   N   A   "   &gt;      
   i   m   g       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   s   c   r   e   e   n   "       s   r   c   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   b   o   o   k   m   a   r   k   l   e   t   s   /   l   i   n   k   a   r   e   n   a   .   g   i   f   "       a   l   t   =   "   L   i   n   k   A   R   E   N   A   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "   &gt;   /   a   &gt;

   p       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   a   b   s   t   "   &gt;   &amp;n   b   s   p   ;   /   p   &gt;      
      
   t   a   b   l   e       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   1   0   0   %   "       c   e   l   l   s   p   a   c   i   n   g   =   "   0   "   &gt;   t   r   &gt;   t   d   &gt;      
   a   d   d   r   e   s   s   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   i   n   d   e   x   e   n   .   h   t   m   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   t   o   p   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   h   o   m   e   "       a   c   c   e   s   s   k   e   y   =   "   0   "   &gt;   i   m   g       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   s   c   r   e   e   n   "       s   r   c   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   h   o   m   e   .   g   i   f   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   0   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   2   5   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       a   l   t   =   "   h   o   m   e   "   &gt;   H   .   W   .       L   a   n   g   /   a   &gt;       &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   w   w   w   .   f   h   -   f   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g   .   d   e   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   t   o   p   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   F   a   c   h   h   o   c   h   s   c   h   u   l   e       F   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g       -       U   n   i   v   e   r   s   i   t   y       o   f       A   p   p   l   i   e   d       S   c   i   e   n   c   e   s   "   &gt;   F   H       F   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g   /   a   &gt;       &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       a       h   r   e   f   =   "   m   a   i   l   t   o   :   l   a   n   g   @   f   h   -   f   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g   .   d   e   "       t   i   t   l   e   =   "   s   e   n   d       c   o   m   m   e   n   t   s   "   &gt;   l   a   n   g   @   f   h   -   f   l   e   n   s   b   u   r   g   .   d   e   /   a   &gt;       &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       a       h   r   e   f   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   i   m   p   r   e   s   s   u   m   .   h   t   m   "       t   a   r   g   e   t   =   "   _   t   o   p   "   &gt;   I   m   p   r   e   s   s   u   m   /   a   &gt;       &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       &amp;c   o   p   y   ;       &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       C   r   e   a   t   e   d   :       1   2   .   0   9   .   1   9   9   7       &amp;n   b   s   p   ;       U   p   d   a   t   e   d   :       2   0   .   1   0   .   2   0   1   3   /   a   d   d   r   e   s   s   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;      
   t   d       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   r   i   g   h   t   "   &gt;   a       h   r   e   f   =   "   h   t   t   p   :   /   /   v   a   l   i   d   a   t   o   r   .   w   3   .   o   r   g   /   c   h   e   c   k   ?   u   r   i   =   r   e   f   e   r   e   r   "   &gt;   i   m   g       c   l   a   s   s   =   "   s   c   r   e   e   n   "       s   r   c   =   "   .   .   /   .   .   /   .   .   /   s   y   m   b   o   l   s   /   v   a   l   i   d   h   t   m   l   4   0   1   .   g   i   f   "       a   l   t   =   "   V   a   l   i   d       H   T   M   L       4   .   0   1       T   r   a   n   s   i   t   i   o   n   a   l   "       b   o   r   d   e   r   =   "   0   "       a   l   i   g   n   =   "   b   o   t   t   o   m   "       h   e   i   g   h   t   =   "   1   6   "       w   i   d   t   h   =   "   4   4   "   &gt;   /   a   &gt;   /   t   d   &gt;   /   t   r   &gt;   /   t   a   b   l   e   &gt;      
   /   d   i   v   &gt;      
   /   b   o   d   y   &gt;      
   /   h   t   m   l   &gt;
  </p>
 </body>
</html>
